title: PC.Building.Simulator.v0.7.10.4.Multilang
description:
Release date: Apr 30, 2018 
Genre : Simulator, 3D, Indie 
Developer: McINTYRE 
Publisher: McINTYRE 
Language: English 
Version: 7.10.4 
Publication Type : Repack 
Tablet: Not required 

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows ™ 7 and higher 
Processor: Intel / AMD 
Memory: 512 MB 
Graphics Card: NVIDIA / Radeon 
DirectX® 9 
Sound Card: DirectX 
Hard disk space: 950 MB 

Description:

A realistic simulator of a computer wizard, dedicated to self-assembly of a PC. According to the creator of PC Building Simulator, the game presents the exact dimensions of 3D models of components, as well as all the corresponding slots for them - as in real life. Players are encouraged to install the processor, graphics, "RAM" and SSD-drives, apply thermal grease, connect the cooling system, twist the screws and connect the components with wires. "Just follow the guide that will help you build your first computer, with a step-by-step description of the components and procedures," the developer wrote. 

Features of the release:

Do not cut 
Do not recoded 
Interface Language Support: English 
There are versions of x64 / x32 
Save game path:% Drive% 
There is a file of checksums 
Pre-alpha release 
Game version: 5.5.1 
Installation time: ~ 5 seconds 
In the installer sounds Kim Waters
